content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the codebase structure. Let me take a quick look at what's here.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Glob">
<parameter name="pattern">**/*</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
- .gitignore
- CLAUDE.md
- FreeCAD/README.md
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.3mf
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.FCStd
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.FCStd1
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.gcode
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.stl
- FreeCAD/box-with-tri-hole.stl.png
- README.md
- csgrs/Cargo.toml
- csgrs/README.md
- csgrs/box-with-tri-hole.stl
- csgrs/box-with-tri-hole.stl.png
- csgrs/src/main.rs
- fornjot/Cargo.toml
- fornjot/README.md
- fornjot/src/lib.rs
- fornjot/src/main.rs
- meshlab.viewstate.txt
</parameter>
</result>

This repository contains a 3D printing project with a simple box design featuring a triangular hole, implemented in three different approaches:

1. **FreeCAD/** - Traditional CAD software implementation
2. **fornjot/** - Rust implementation using the Fornjot b-rep CAD kernel
3. **csgrs/** - Rust implementation using CSG (Constructive Solid Geometry)

The project demonstrates the same 40x40x15mm box with a triangular hole (circumscribed by a 7.5mm radius circle) built with different tools for comparison purposes.

Ready to assist with any exploration or planning tasks for this codebase.
